sourcesContent:
Reports

Occupancy Report

ID Room Number Occupant Name Occupancy Date
{{ report.id }} {{ report.room_number }} {{ report.occupant_name }} {{ report.occupancy_date | date }}

Payment Report

ID Booking ID Amount Payment Date Method Status
{{ report.payment_id }} {{ report.booking_id }} {{ report.amount | currency }} {{ report.payment_date | date }} {{ report.payment_method }} {{ report.status }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-reports', templateUrl: './reports.component.html', styleUrls: ['./reports.component.css'] }) export class ReportsComponent { }
